reviews.review_msg: Perfect summer class. Not a lot of irrelevant reading. Interesting topic and Lisa is so eager to hear what everyone has to say. Gave me a different perspective on marketing ethics. The class was awesome all around. Would take another class with her for sure.
i don lern lots from jon. he is a great professur and made me etfical

Excellent prof. Interesting and engaging. Great teaching style and understands what it is like to be a student. Doesn't force readings, although they are interesting /helpful. Highly recommend! One of the best profs I've had.
John was the best professor I have ever had. He is casual, brilliant and facilitates intelligent discourse.

This class is all about discussion and participation. If you follow the discussions you'll guarantee a B easily. Emily is a super nice person and makes the class as engaging as possible. Theres no textbook but she makes sure that the course content covers what you need to know. Very chill, easy to understand, down to earth and passionate
Linda is a great prof! She brings an interesting perspective to the class and has solid participation  based lectures.  She assigns a lot of reading, too much really.
Lots of homework and readings + unclear instruction.

Adam is awesome! He really cares about students and is approachable. Adam has a great sense of humor and always keeps students thinking. He really loves Jersey Shore. He is one of my fav prof's of all time.
